comment.author: 25100796@N08
comment._content: This appears to be a prisoner of war (POW) camp.  If the Zossen referenced is Zossen, Brandenburg, Germany, then the probable date is 1914 - 1918 (WW I).  Given the condition of the barracks siding (relatively unblemished and unweathered), I'd guess that the photo was probably taken in early 1915.
